attributes.action: Peadofiles should get longer time in jail
attributes.additional_details: Peadofiles get less time in jail then murders. Why? They are both high risk to our communities so shouldn't they both have long sentences. No room in our jails isn't an excuse they are dangerous to our children, so please sign this if you want the government to change the way the peadofiles get sentenced. We need justice to keep our children safe!!
